results.description: St Pauli beat city rivals Hamburg at home for the first time in 59 years in the Bundesliga 2 derby match.
results.shortTitle: St Pauli earn historic Hamburg derby win
results.title: St Pauli beat Hamburg at home for the first time in 59 years

results.description: The German Football Federation says that three clubs have withdrawn their objections over the eligibility of Hamburg's Gambian player Bakery Jatta.
results.shortTitle: German sides withdraw objections over Gambia's Jatta
results.title: Bakery Jatta: German sides withdraw objections over Gambian's eligibility

results.description: Sheffield Wednesday sign Massimo Luongo from QPR and agree loan deals for Hamburg's David Bates and Newcastle's Jacob Murphy.
results.shortTitle: Sheff Wed sign Bates, Luongo and Murphy
results.title: Sheffield Wednesday: Owls sign David Bates, Massimo Luongo & Jacob Murphy

thumbnail.altText: David Bates, Massimo Luongo and Jacob Murphy

results.description: Arsenal winger Xavier Amaechi completes a move to Hamburg after signing a four-year contract with the German second division club.
results.title: Xavier Amaechi: Arsenal winger signs for Hamburg on four-year deal

results.description: Scotland international David Bates says he is experiencing a "completely different game" after joining Hamburg from Rangers.
results.title: David Bates: Former Rangers defender relishing life in Germany with Hamburg

results.description: What is the best nickname you've heard in football? David Bates, aka the 'Ginger Ramos', talks about his first season in Germany with Hamburg SV.
results.title: David Bates 'out to prove his game' in Germany

results.description: Hamburg are relegated from the Bundesliga for the first time as fans delay the end of the match against Borussia Monchengladbach by throwing flares.
results.title: Hamburg relegated from Bundesliga as flares delay end of match

results.description: Hamburg must win their last game of the season and hope Wolfsburg lose if they are to avoid automatic relegation from the Bundesliga.
results.title: Eintracht Frankfurt 3-0 Hamburg SV

results.description: Rangers defender David Bates agrees a four-year deal with Hamburg, the German club announces.
results.shortTitle: Gers defender Bates to join Hamburg
results.title: Rangers: Defender David Bates signs four-year deal with Hamburg

results.description: Michy Batshuayi scores his third goal in his second game for Borussia Dortmund, as Marco Reus returns from an eight-month lay-off.
results.title: Borussia Dortmund 2-0 Hamburg

results.description: Bayern Munich make it three wins in a row under Jupp Heynckes as they beat Hamburg to move level at the top of the Bundesliga.
results.title: Hamburg 0-1 Bayern Munich

results.description: Peter Bosz becomes the first manager in Bundesliga history to guide his side to a clean sheet in his first five games as Borussia Dortmund beat Hamburg 3-0.
results.title: Hamburger SV 0-3 Borussia Dortmund

thumbnail.altText: Dortmund's Shinji Kagawa (right) celebrates with his teammate Andrey Yarmolenko

results.description: Liverpool-bound midfielder Naby Keita scores a thumping, long-range goal as RB Leipzig beat Hamburg in the Bundesliga.
results.title: Keita scores as Leipzig beat Hamburg

results.description: Real Madrid and Barcelona battle for the title on the final day of La Liga on Sunday, while Juventus can be crowned champions of Italy.
results.shortTitle: Five-year wait over for Real Madrid?
results.title: Real Madrid on brink of La Liga title while Juventus can clinch Serie A

thumbnail.altText: Real Madrid boss Zinedine Zidane (left) and Barcelona boss Luis Enrique

results.description: Carlo Ancelotti celebrates his 1,000th match as a manager with an 8-0 Bayern Munich victory over Hamburg, including a Robert Lewandowski hat-trick.
results.title: Bayern Munich 8-0 Hamburger SV

results.description: Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang marks his return to the Borussia Dortmund side with four goals in a thumping win away to Hamburg.
results.title: Hamburger SV 2-5 Borussia Dortmund

thumbnail.altText: Borussia Dortmund striker Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang celebrates scoring against Hamburg

results.description: Hamburg sack boss Bruno Labbadia for the second time, after a poor start to the Bundesliga season.
results.shortTitle: Hamburg sack Labbadia for second time
results.title: Bruno Labbadia: Hamburg sack manager after poor start to the season
